level.text: A massage therapist licensed under the provisions of this chapter shall include the number of his or her license in any advertisement of massage services appearing in any newspaper, airwave transmission, telephone directory or other advertising medium.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 45 DCR 7716 (October 30, 1998); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 50 DCR 2048 (May 7, 2003).
